title: Pixenio
description: Many times we have to say no to our friends when they ask for one. It's because the fact that creating & maintaining website is currently still an annoying task that shouldn't be. It applies twice as that on their end to manage content & change design over time. So here we are. We want to automate this proccess and bring back the simplicity to the websites in the world of clunky builders & CMSes.
